meta.content: Theater; Corrections; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

abstract.p: March 21 article about play Copenhagen, which deals with role of physicist Werner Heisenberg in Nazi atomic bomb effort, referred incompletely to related seminar to be held on March 27

block.p: An article in Science Times yesterday about the play ''Copenhagen,'' which deals with the role of the physicist Werner Heisenberg in the Nazi atomic bomb effort, referred incompletely to a related seminar to be held on Monday. The seminar as a whole was created by the Ensemble Studio Theater and the Alfred P. Sloan Foundation in conjunction with the Graduate Center of the City University. The session on the play was organized by the Ensemble Studio Theater. The sessions involving the science and history of the bomb work were organized by Dr. Brian Schwartz, vice president for research at the City University.
